content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Juan. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I am open to negotiate.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment, Juan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must emphasize that as a landlord, my primary goal is to maximize my gains. I am sure we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. May I ask what is your proposed rental price for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for 400 Euros per month. This is my final offer.

TERMINATE
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize, Juan, but I must decline your proposed rental price of 400 Euros per month. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am unable to accept such a low rental price for this 25 square meter apartment. I am confident that we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial and reflects the true value of the apartment. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
